{"id":"867bbf9b-48e2-422a-9f36-9c37916dbfe8","name":"Unresolved BuildConfig fields in BaseUrls.kt","timestamp":1750364709830,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"

<current_file>
```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/xbsaykat/klistify/env/BaseUrls.kt, lines=ALL(1-15)
import com.xbsaykat.klistify.BuildConfig
import com.xbsaykat.klistify.utils.Types.BuildType

private val currentEnv = if (BuildConfig.DEBUG) BuildType.STAGE
else BuildType.PRODUCTION

val CurrentBuildType = currentEnv.name

val BASE_URL = when (currentEnv) {
 BuildType.PRODUCTION -> BuildConfig.base
 BuildType.STAGE -> BuildConfig.stage_baseurl
 BuildType.DEV -> BuildConfig.dev_baseurl
 else -> BuildConfig.baseurl
}

```
</current_file>


<linter_errors>
## Linter Errors

Path: app/src/main/java/com/xbsaykat/klistify/env/BaseUrls.kt
Errors:

Line 10: Unresolved reference 'base'.
Line 11: Unresolved reference 'stage_baseurl'.
Line 12: Unresolved reference 'dev_baseurl'.
Line 13: Unresolved reference 'baseurl'.
</linter_errors>


<attached_files>
<file_contents>
```kotlin:app/src/main/java/com/xbsaykat/klistify/env/BaseUrls.kt, lines=ALL(1-6)

The linter errors show that the properties 'base', 'stage_baseurl', 'dev_baseurl', and 'baseurl' are unresolved references in the BuildConfig class.

Looking at the code, it's trying to access properties from BuildConfig that apparently don't exist. These properties are typically defined in the gradle build files (build.gradle) as buildConfigField definitions.

I need to look at the build.gradle file to see if these properties are defined there, and if not, I'll need to define them or fix the references to match what's actually available in BuildConfig.

import com.xbsaykat.klistify.BuildConfig
import com.xbsaykat.klistify.utils.Types.BuildType

private val currentEnv = if (BuildConfig.DEBUG) BuildType.STAGE
else BuildType.PRODUCTION

val CurrentBuildType = currentEnv.name

val BASE_URL = when (currentEnv) {
 BuildType.PRODUCTION -> BuildConfig.baseurl
 BuildType.STAGE -> BuildConfig.stage_baseurl
 BuildType.DEV -> BuildConfig.dev_baseurl
 else -> BuildConfig.baseurl
}

```

import com.xbsaykat.klistify.BuildConfig

 BuildType.PRODUCTION -> BuildConfig.base
 BuildType.STAGE -> BuildConfig.stage_baseurl
 BuildType.DEV -> BuildConfig.dev_baseurl
 else -> BuildConfig.baseurl
}
